workshoptitle: Get Started with OCI Stack Monitoring for PeopleSoft

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Explanation of the Workshop and Goals

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable).

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Easy Onboarding
tutorials.description: In this lab, the recently provisioned OCI Trial tenancy will used for provision of OCI user profile, groups, policies

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Setup OCI User, Policies, Groups
tutorials.description: In this lab, the recently provisioned OCI Trial tenancy will used for provision of OCI user profile, groups, policies

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Prerequisites to Configure PeopleSoft Application
tutorials.description: In this lab, you will configure PeopleSoft for OCI Stack Monitoring

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Agent setup & deployment
tutorials.description: In this lab, you will setup agent for both on-premises & OCI

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Resource discovery using Stack Monitoring
tutorials.description: Setup Stack Monitoring for PSFT on OCI

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Monitor the PeopleSoft Application resources
tutorials.description: Visualize the PSFT Application data using OOB dashboard

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
